com.epoch.substns

Class SubstnUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.substns.SubstnUtils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubstnConstants

    public final class SubstnUtils
extends Object
implements SubstnConstants
    Contains methods that select the shortcut groups that will substitute for generic R groups in the molecule of Figure 1 in a particular student's view of an R-group question, and that replace those generic R groups with the shortcut groups; also contains methods that select the values that will substitute for variables in the question statement or NumberIs evaluator of a particular student's view of a numeric question.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.epoch.substns.substnConstants.SubstnConstants

        ADD_H_ATOMS, NUMERIC_VALUE, SUBSTNS_SEP, WORD_VALUE_SEP

    • Method Detail

      • debugPrint

        private static void debugPrint(Object... msg)

        private static void debugPrintMRV(Object... msg)

      • chooseSubstnValues

        public static String[] chooseSubstnValues(QDatum[] substnStrs,
                                          boolean isNumeric)
        From each set of R-group collections or numerical values, choose one shortcut group to substitute each generic R group in a Figure, or one value to substitute each variable in a numeric question statement.
        Parameters:
        substnStrs - array of text QDatum corresponding to each generic R group or variable, each containing a colon-separated list of either all the collections from which each R group may be selected or all the values that may be selected for that variable
        isNumeric - if the question is numeric, so we are choosing numerical values
        Returns:
        array of shortcut groups or values, each to replace a generic R group or variable

      • substituteRGroups

        public static Molecule substituteRGroups(String mrvDef,
                                         String[] substSGroups)
        Replace generic R groups in a molecule with shortcut groups.
        Parameters:
        mrvDef - an MRV representation of a molecule
        substSGroups - array of shortcut groups as strings
        Returns:
        a Molecule in which the generic R groups are replaced with the specified shortcut groups

      • substituteRGroups

        public static Molecule substituteRGroups(String mrvDef,
                                         String[] substSGroups,
                                         boolean addHAtoms)
        Replace generic R groups in a molecule with shortcut groups.
        Parameters:
        mrvDef - an MRV representation of a molecule
        substSGroups - array of shortcut groups as strings
        addHAtoms - whether to add explicit H atoms to the shortcut groups
        Returns:
        a Molecule in which the generic R groups are replaced with the specified shortcut groups

                                         Molecule[] rgMols)
        Replace generic R groups in a molecule with shortcut groups.
        Parameters:
        mrvDef - an MRV representation of a molecule
        rgMols - array of the shortcut groups as Molecules
        Returns:
        a Molecule in which the generic R groups are replaced with the specified shortcut groups

        rgMols - array of the shortcut groups as Molecules

      • substituteRGroups

        public static void substituteRGroups(Molecule authorMol,
                                     Molecule[] rgMols)
        Replace generic R groups in a molecule with shortcut groups. Modifies the original!
        Parameters:
        authorMol - a molecule
        rgMols - array of the shortcut groups as Molecules

      • substituteRGroups

                                     Molecule[] rgMols,
                                     boolean addHAtoms)
        Replace generic R groups in a molecule with shortcut groups. Modifies the original!
        Parameters:

        rgMols - array of the shortcut groups as Molecules

      • getTranslationVector

        private static DPoint3 getTranslationVector(SelectionMolecule fragMol,
                                            DPoint3 oldCtr,
                                            DPoint3 oldDims,
                                            MPolyline rxnArrow)
        Gets the translation vector to put a 2D-cleaned fragment with instantiated R groups back to its original distance from a reaction arrow (which is assumed to be horizontal or close to it and pointing to right).
        Parameters:
        fragMol - the fragment
        oldCtr - former position of the center of the fragment
        oldDims - former dimensions of the fragment
        rxnArrow - the reaction arrow
        Returns:
        a translation vector

      • getTranslationVector

        private static DPoint3 getTranslationVector(DPoint3 oldCtr,
                                            DPoint3 oldDims,
                                            DPoint3 newCtr,
                                            DPoint3 newDims,
                                            boolean isLeftOfArrow)
        Gets the translation vector to put a 2D-cleaned fragment with instantiated R groups that used to be before or after a reaction arrow back to its original distance from the reaction arrow (which is assumed to be horizontal or close to it and pointing to right).
        Parameters:
        oldCtr - former position of the center of the fragment
        oldDims - former dimensions of the fragment
        newCtr - new position of the center of the fragment
        newDims - new dimensions of the fragment
        isLeftOfArrow - true if fragment began left of the arrow
        Returns:
        a translation vector

      • getTranslationVector

        private static DPoint3 getTranslationVector(DPoint3 oldCtr,
                                            DPoint3 oldDims,
                                            DPoint3 newCtr,
                                            DPoint3 newDims,
                                            double arrowY)
        Gets the translation vector to put a 2D-cleaned fragment with instantiated R groups that used to be above or below a reaction arrow back to its original distance from the reaction arrow (which is assumed to be horizontal or close to it and pointing to right).
        Parameters:
        oldCtr - former position of the center of the fragment
        oldDims - former dimensions of the fragment
        newCtr - new position of the center of the fragment
        newDims - new dimensions of the fragment
        arrowY - average Y coordinate of the arrow
        Returns:
        a translation vector

      • getRGroupMols

        public static Molecule[] getRGroupMols(String[] rGroupStrs)
        Gets Molecule versions of shortcut groups.
        Parameters:
        rGroupStrs - array of shortcut group names
        Returns:
        array of Molecule versions of the shortcut groups, with attachment points stored in each Molecule

      • substituteValues

        public static String substituteValues(String str,
                                      String[] values,
                                      boolean numeric)
        Substitutes values into a string with [[x1]], etc.
        Parameters:
        str - the string
        values - array of values to substitute for variables in the statement
        numeric - if the values are in the format word = value, substitute the value
        Returns:
        statement of this question for display

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        HTML string
